main event: On 2 August 1961, a couple observed five round objects emitting brilliant light, floating in the air over Suffolk, Virginia.
interesting points: The objects were described as oblong-spherical in shape, the size of basketballs, and changed colors from intense white to orange-red., Witnesses reported the objects had a pulsing or wavering brightness., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., Several witnesses including an eight-year-old girl also reported seeing the objects., No exhaust, sound, or trails were observed from the objects.
sighted object: five round objects with brilliant light
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. Howell, average American citizens, about 50 years of age, with a local bank position.
